content.heading: <aside> Tag
paragraphs: The <aside> tag defines content indirectly related to the main content.

Example:

My family and I visited Epcot this summer. The weather was nice!

Epcot Center

Epcot is a theme park at Walt Disney World with attractions and events.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Style with CSS for visual distinction.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported by Chrome 6.0, Edge 9.0, Firefox 4.0, Safari 5.0, Opera 11.1.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
Styled aside:

The aside element

My family and I visited Epcot this summer.

Epcot is a theme park at Walt Disney World.
